item.title: Kristine add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplaceable being." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There are many things worth living for, a few things worth dying for, and nothing worth killing for." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There is no such thing as a weird human being, It's just that some people require more understanding than others." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "If you believe in peace, act peacefully; if you believe in love, acting lovingly; if you believe every which way, then act every which way, that's perfectly valid - but don't go out trying to sell your beliefs to the system. You end up contradicting what you profess to believe in, and you set a bum example. If you want to change the world, change yourself." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "A sense of humor...is superior to any religion so far devised." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "It's never too late to have a happy childhood." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Love easily confuses us because it is always in flux between illusion and substance, between memory and wish, between contentment and need." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Respect was invented to cover the empty place where love should be." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Kristine add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "If you look for perfection, you'll never be content." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Kristine add a quote by John Mortimer
item.description: "The people look forbidding, solemn, marked by that impossible ideal, Communism, which, like Christianity, seemed to demand too much of humanity and, falling into the wrong hands, led too easily to horrible brutality." -- John Mortimer

item.title: Kristine add a quote by John Mortimer
item.description:
"Rumpole, you must move with the times."
"If I don't like the way the times are moving, I shall refuse to accompany them." -- John Mortimer
